name: Millennium Eye (Skill Card)
text:
Pegasus / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]
At the start of the Duel, look at your opponent's opening hand. 
You may choose to have that player shuffle their hand into their Deck and draw a new hand. (If both players use a Skill at the same time, the Turn player resolves their Skill first.)
